mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART_PROD (CART_NUM, PROD_NUM, PROD_CNT, PROD_PRICE) VALUES (#{CART_NUM}, #{PROD_NUM}, #{PROD_CNT}, #{PROD_PRICE})
mapper.select: SELECT cp.*, p.prod_name AS prodName, p.prod_image AS prodImage, p.prod_price AS prodPrice FROM CART_PROD cp JOIN PRODUCT p ON cp.prod_num = p.prod_num WHERE cp.cart_num = #{CART_NUM}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_PROD WHERE CART_NUM = #{cartNum} AND PROD_NUM = #{prodNum}
